TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintBooleanProperty extends System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty
Public NotInheritable Class PrintBooleanProperty Inherits PrintProperty

summary.span: 表示打印系统硬件或软件组件的 属性（及其值）。

span.span: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态中的现有打印机安装其属性不同另一台打印机时使用此类。The following example shows how to use this class while installing a second printer whose properties differ from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: The name of the attribute that the represents.

summary.span: 为指定的特性初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`应拼写的某些特定的名称完全相同打印系统对象，包括大小写的属性。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，属性对象必须拼写"IsBusy"，不"忙"或"Isbusy"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "IsBusy", not "Busy" or "Isbusy".

remarks.format: ## Remarks `attributeName`应拼写的某些特定的名称完全相同打印系统对象，包括大小写的属性。The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular property of a print system object, including casing. 例如，属性对象必须拼写"IsBusy"，不"忙"或"Isbusy"。For example, the property of a object must be spelled "IsBusy", not "Busy" or "Isbusy". ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何安装不同另一台打印机在其属性与现有打印机仅在位置、 端口和共享的状态时使用此构造函数。The following example shows how to use this constructor while installing a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]
